MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL11 Moss area of Wrexham. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am due to the need to replace a snapped pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:08am on 16th February 2021.
